unnormalised: Plot no. 123, mhonnllear 'prime location', main road-dhaan itlean pois asa, tumkam GPS ani untt zai poddtto; PIN code 400078-ak 'Lost in Translation' mhonnun nav dovrunk zai.
normalised: Plot number ekso tevis, kiteak tor 'prime location' mhunn sangtat, main rosteacherlean itlen pois asa, tumkam ek G-P-S ani ek untt zai poddtto; P-I-N code char lakh satari mhunn doryek 'Lost in Translation' mhunn noven nanv divonk zai.
